mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employees (first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, employee_position, hire_date, salary) VALUES (#{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{position}, #{hireDate}, #{salary})
mapper.sql: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, e.email, e.phone_number, e.employee_position, e.hire_date, e.salary FROM employees e
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM employees e WHERE e.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE employees SET first_name = #{firstName}, last_name = #{lastName}, email = #{email}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, employee_position = #{position}, hire_date = #{hireDate}, salary = #{salary} WHERE id = #{id}
